Description: Available on 08-16-2023. Great Boston alternative two bedroom apartment in a professionally managed building. Coin operated and credit card laundry on the floor. Gym located inside building. Hardwood floors. City of Chelsea permitted Street parking. Tenants are responsible for W+S, heat, electricity, and cooking gas. Pet Negotiable, Cats $50/Mo & Dogs $75/Mo. looking for good credit renter. One month broker fee is required.
